name: Pong Platform Shooter
description:
A simple platform shooter as an entry for Mini Ludum Dare #58.
The theme of theme was: Pong

Current Version: v 0.4

Instructions:

WASD/Arrows: Move + Jump
Spacebar/Z: Shoot
M: Toggle Music/Sound

Credits

  • Hero Sprite and Animations by software_atelier
  • Projectiles, Paddle Tiles, Platform Tiles by Jason-Em
  • Enemy Sprites and Animations Ground Tiles by bevouliin
  • SFX made with Bxfr by increpare
  • Music 'Digital Voyage' by twinmusicom
  • Programming by @chongdashu
